articles.description: While his Ghosted co-star Ana de Armas gets ready to host Saturday Night Live for the first time this weekend, Chris Evans reveals he's terrified of hosting.
articles.content:
While his Ghosted co-star Ana de Armas gets ready to host Saturday Night Live for the first time this weekend, Chris Evans reveals he's terrified of hosting.
